tool.name: OGS: Raster2PointCloud
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'Raster2PointCloud'.
tool.command: Raster2PointCloud #if str($gamma): --gamma '$gamma' #end if #if str($max_points): --max-points '$max_points' #end if #if str($max_elevation): --max-elevation '$max_elevation' #end if --output '$output' --input '$input'

param.name: gamma
param.label: gamma
param.help: Exponental increase coefficient. A value of '1' indicates a linear increase, smaller or larger values indicate a logarithmic or exponential increase, respectively (default: 1).

param.name: max_points
param.label: max points
param.help: Maximum number of points per pixel (default: 1000).

param.name: max_elevation
param.label: max elevation
param.help: Maximum elevation of randomly created points (default: 5000).

param.name: output
param.label: output
param.help: Path to output polydata files (*.vtp). Specifying 'file.vtp' will make the programme write a series of files called 'file0.vtp', 'file1.vtp', etc.

param.name: input
param.label: input
param.help: Path to input raster files (*.asc). Specifying 'file.asc' will make the programme look for a series of files called 'file0.asc', 'file1.asc', etc.

tool.help: This tool runs the **Raster2PointCloud** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
